snippet: The Art and Antique Dealers League of America Spring Show, now in its second year at the Park Avenue Armory, features 63 exhibitors.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Art and Antique Dealers League of America Spring Show at the Park Avenue Armory. Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: Park Avenue Armory, at 67th StreetThrough Sunday

headline.main: Art and Antique Dealers League of America Spring Show
